channel.title: Kaia CCO Onboarding - Pre-Mainnet
channel.description: This online instruction let you join Kaia Pre-mainnet network.

item.title: Kaia Installation
item.description: Package installation for node configuration are covered in this chapter. Please click the next button > on the right side of this page.

item.title: Kaia Configuration
item.description: In this chapter, you will set the Pre-Mainnet network configuration. Please click the next button > on the right side of this page.

item.title: Monitoring Setup
item.description: Install telegraf for monitoring. Please click the next button > on the right side of this page.

item.title: Start the services
item.description: Now, we are ready to start Pre-Mainnet service. Please click the next button > on the right side of this page.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: Congratulations!! Now, you are playing in the Pre-Mainnet network.
